summary: This bill, the St. Louis RECA Readjustment Act, amends the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act to include additional ZIP codes (63106, 63107) for claims related to Manhattan Project waste in St. Louis. The amendment is intended to provide compensation to individuals affected by radiation exposure from the project, specifically expanding eligibility to residents in additional areas. The bill's effective date is retroactive to the enactment of Public Law 119-21.
